Plot: A documentary that details the creation of Julian Assange's controversial website, which facilitated the largest security breach in U.S. history.
Title: We Steal Secrets: The Story of WikiLeaks
Actors: John 'FuzzFace' McMahon, Alex Gibney, Julian Assange, Robert Manne
tomatoConsensus: As fascinating as it is provocative, We Steal Secrets: The Story of Wikileaks presents another documentary triumph for director Alex Gibney, as well as a troubling look at one of the more meaningful issues of our time.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 8 nominations.
